video_title: How to do an ice bath
transcript:
so we all have a window of tolerance or
how much stress our mind and body can
cope with before we become disregulated
we want to work on widening our window
or teaching our body to deal with more
and more stress we can do that by
putting ourselves in New Or
uncomfortable situations like an ice
bowl when I put my hands in here my body
is going to go into a stress response by
breathing calmly and deeply and by
telling the racing thoughts in my mind
that I'm safe will help expand my body's
ability to deal with the stressful event
it looks like
this
